scripts.predev: pnpm --dir packages/core build && pnpm --dir packages/content build
scripts.prebuild: pnpm --dir packages/core build && pnpm --dir packages/content build
scripts.prepreview: pnpm --dir packages/core build && pnpm --dir packages/content build
scripts.prepreview:api: pnpm --dir packages/core build && pnpm --dir packages/content build
scripts.cleanAll: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/node_modules && rm -rf packages/*/dist && rm -rf packages/*/.output
